name: DRAGON BUSTER
description:
DRAGON BUSTER is a fast-paced first person action roguelike created in  LÖVE2D over the course of one week for 7DRL 2018.  Three levels filled to the brim with tough enemies and tons of interesting powerups that make each run fun and unique.

Do you have what it takes to be the DRAGON BUSTER?

CONTROLS:

  • WASD = Movement
  • LMOUSE = Swing Sword
  • RMOUSE = Interact (Open chests, talk to shopkeeper, etc.)
  • ESCAPE = Quit game

CREDITS:
